name: Send
description:
INTRODUCTION:
"Send!" is a horror/ mystery/ story-driven game using RPG Maker Vx Ace. The game talk about a boy who loves adventures and mysteries.

PLOT:
A 10 year old boy with dreams and hopes, takes a decision that can lead him into a dangerous path.
-----------------------
Jacob takes the decision to leave the house at midnight after a fight he had with his parents. It wasn't the first time he had a fight with his parents about his sister! Curiosity leads him to a dangerous path. He finds an envelope that needs to be delivered to a strange place never heard before. Along the road, our main character will be accompanied by a new friend, Mark, who is also a 10-year-old boy that got an envelope to be delivered to the same address as our main character has to go! Will they complete the delivery? Will they return home? Send!

-----------------------
Warning:
The game contains jumpscares/ small jumpscares, violence, death, blood and other horror details. Proceed with caution!

RTP (Run Time Package) is required to run the game. Make sure you have installed RTP before playing it. Download it here: https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages#rpg-maker-vx-a...

------------------------

Demo covers the prologue of the full game. 
Gameplay: 20-25 minutes.

---------------------------------
